channel.title: Cant find path specified for berky compiler
channel.description: OK running the server for the berky 508 source is good... but since i try to run the compile it does nothing but say "cannot find path specified" someone please help me.

item.title: Cant find path specified for berky compiler
item.dc:creator: @Rii0N Rii0N
item.description:
@Rii0N wrote:

every time you use a diff source or client right click the run.bat click edit and change the JDK1.6.0_13 the. Change the _13 to your version. To check go to my computer > C drive > program files > Java. you’ll see the name of the files are same as in the run.bat etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Cant find path specified for berky compiler

item.title: Cant find path specified for berky compiler
item.dc:creator: @OrionScape OrionScape
item.description:
@OrionScape wrote:

What the heck? Go get a tut, that helped me! I learned that you had to set SYSTEM VARIABLES as something in Environment Variables. You guys are just messing this poor fella up. That should help you out. Go to Google and search “Classpath Variables for Java.” OK, good luck!

Read full topic
